message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more
I think we can do a little better than that. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?
Meet me in the middle, I'll take 58%
Time is running out, let's split the difference of our last offers to 52/48.

This is my final offer. 51/49. Take it or leave it - we both lose if we don't agree now.
